00024 void
00025 MMLmsub::doLayout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00026         MMLNode *base = first;
00027         MMLNode *sub = last;
00028         // read metrics for current font
00029         base->layout(a);
00030         a->setAttribute(MML::DISPLAYSTYLE, false);
00031         int sl = a->scriptlevel()+1;
00032         a->setAttribute(MML::SCRIPTLEVEL, sl);
00033         sub->layout(a);
00034 
00035         float shift = a->subscriptshift().get(a);
00036         if (shift == 0) {
00037                 shift = base->getDescent()-sub->getDescent();
00038         }
00039         sub->setX(base->getWidth());
00040         sub->setY(shift);
00041 
00042         gui->width = base->getWidth() + sub->getWidth();
00043         gui->ascent = base->getAscent();
00044         gui->descent = base->getDescent();
00045 }
00046 void
00047 MMLmsub::doPaint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00048         MMLNode *base = first;
00049         MMLNode *sub = last;
00050         base->paint(a);
00051         a->setAttribute(MML::DISPLAYSTYLE, false);
00052         int sl = a->scriptlevel()+1;
